Title: The Pool
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Fogelman, Donald Todd, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Jack and Rebecca take their kids to the community pool; Kevin experiences his first NYC audition; Kate stalks Toby's ex; William's past sends Randall spinning.
